Nearly 700 hours spent in game evenly spread between both survivor and killer sides, an honest review.

In Short: Often on Sale, buy it then the multiple bugs and toxic community (and developers explained later) make this game worth a shot but only at the reduced price of 75% off.

To start dead by daylight offers a cat and mouse chase and hunt unlike any game i have ever played, the fear factor soon wears off and you start to truly feel proud when reaching high levels of play and pull of well timed flashlight saves and fast vaults around strong loops.

The game has encountered many broken stages which are sometimes fixed and sometimes reworked or removed, the game often feels very unbalanced with some maps providing killers 3 generators extremely close or multiple T and L walls into a god tier loop that forces killers to break chase or lose multiple generators.

Generators are the Objective for this game with survivors aiming to power 5 and escape through the doors or protecting them by hunting said survivors, this is the first point the skill checks are very easy with the removal of "ruin" a perk reworked instead of fixing. A generator takes 80 seconds to power alone with 1 second taken off for each time a great skill check is landed, this game requires patience and is not as action packed unless playing killer.

Killer is a considerably stressful role, requiring arguably the most in game knowledge to prosper. It is strongly recommended to start the game on survivor and transition as more game knowledge grows. The role feels unrewarding at times with some maps having vast amounts of god tier pallets and loops, playing against organised teams.

The game does not have communication between survivors, the game is balanced around this however this is easily bypassed by playing with friends and the use of popular discord servers. 

I have encountered a few hackers but many keep it low key such as knowing what the killer is from the lobby or wall hacks, many of these things can be obtained through the object of obsession perk so it does not break the game to badly.

The various bugs in this game are to vast to count with multiple cosmetics constantly being introduced it would be nice for the "devs" to spend 10% more time to just fix the bugs than to push cosmetics constantly. 

The Game is so broken you are required to go to the website to report bugs instead of being able to do it in game, this is processed and feels super unsatisfactory as if you are just being "palmed off" and from my vast experience reporting multiple under the floor bugs and glitched pallets very little is ever done to solve them with the list growing over time.

The game is not pay to win however certain cosmetics definitely are harder to see with the famous "blendette" making life very difficult for the new killer.

After Reaching Rank 1 In Both Cues (Before it became SUPER easy) I rate the game the following:

General Gameplay: 7/10    Unique, Crisp and Addictive
Graphics: 6/10                   Often Difficult to Make Out Even On Ultra Settings
Bugs and Glitches: 2/10    Vast and Counting
Replayability: 10/10          New chapters, Rift system keeps it "fresh-ish"
Cosmetics: 5/10                Half of them look good, some can be obtained for free.

Final Verdict:
If your a horror fan and are willing to pay for DLC like nightmare on elm street, halloween, texas chainsaw and the likes definitely worth a shot, but make sure you buy it on sale as it is frequently greatly reduced. The base game comes with enough killers to make it entertaining. Take into account that the following DLC's are required to access some "meta perks" Texas chain for BBQ, Laurie Strode for DS. The Developers have shown no interest in fixing the game from my experiences and I have even got a warning for trying to contact them and sharing details of the events and bringing attention to certain bugs, however the game has so much potential i will still recommend it only if on sale.

Overall the concept and idea of the game is good and I would recommend it. It is worth the price for the amount of fun time you can have with it.

Positives:
+ Initially the game gives you some good frights and tension
+ Variety of characters, ethnics and aesthetics to pick and chose from
+ Variety of skills and abilities that are mostly unique and some have good synergy
+ Variety of maps
+ DLC costs are fair
+ Skin costs are fair
+ One of very few companies who communicates with the community
+ A lot of good license characters available
+ The game has a tutorial that explains the basics
+ Various ways to play the game (stealth / agressive)

Negatives:
- A few bugs here and there
- Some really annoying perks / addons on killers / survivors like 1 shot long range axes (to name an example), keys and moris (to name a few more)
- Toxic community - Not everyone is toxic but a large portion of players are but lets be real you get that in every game these days
- Matchmaking is pretty bad (but DBD is trying to fix this)
- Steep learning curve / unforgiving gameplay. You either have to learn and improve and adapt and overcome or you will be having a bad time as you climb ranks

An excellent game that you can play casually or more seriously. The community can be a little rough around the edges, but what multiplayer game can't that be said about? If you like horror and you like multiplayer games, I can't recommend Dead by Daylight enough.

This game is a complete and utter waste of 22~ dollars. Matchmaking takes roughly 8-10 minutes per match from what I've experienced, and the game stops being fun after only a few matches once you realize that killers are far too easy to bully. The game's not fun, do NOT buy it.

Эта игра хороша лишь потому, что в нее можно зайти с друзьями и отлично провести время. Соло играть невозможно, советую не тратить свое время. Только фан, ни на что больше она претендовать не может.

Кусок говна, который ели-ели работает, а если работает, то вылетает, разрабы нихуя не делают, и вводят только всякую дизбалансную хуету, и ничего не решают, помянем ДБД как игру, а разрабов поминать не будем, потому что они долбаёбы криворукие, неспособные за почти пять лет, что либо в этой игре исправить, особенно оптимизацию. 
Игра появилась 14 июня 2016 года, а ошибки в ней, как память о создании этого шедеврального дерьма, существуют до сих пор. На вопросы разрабы  отвечают просто, -" проблема не в нас, проблема в тебе, апой пеку, и меняй инет, не помогло, попробуй снова, вдруг поможет KEKW".
P.s. Разрабы когда пытаются что-то фиксить, успешно открывают новые баги в этой и без того дурявой хуйете.
P.s.s. Я думаю, стоит задуматься о том, что бы наше правительство вводило фиксы в дбд, ибо и то, и то дерьмо всё ещё держится на плаву. Во втором случае, я буду хотя бы знать, что за долбаёбы это делают.
P.s.s.s ПОМЯНЕМ НАХУЙ, НО ДИЗРЕСПЕКТ ВАМ. Долбаёбы.

В целом всё как всегда идея игры прекрасная, но отношение модеров и разрабов к игрокам на чьи деньги они пируют по*уистическое. В игре имеют место быть читеры с которыми не борются. Неработающая система репортов, сам лично более 100 репортов отсылал с текстом "игрок намеренно сливал игру и по всему видно что он сосал х*й осла, как и модераторы + разработчики" , но что то меня за такие текста не забанили, а думается мне это потому что никто их и не читает. в игре куча ошибок, а они вместо их исправления картинки и шкурки новые клепают.  От этой фирмы никогда ничего больше не куплю и вам не советую.   Через год решил дописать: пара новых карт настолько тёмные что я будучи убийцей не вижу воооообще ничего, генератор найти не могу который со мной в комнате, в комнате со мной спрятался выживший шкафчик, я шкаф не вижу в темноте, разрабы прям ноги вытирают о своих клиентов и им збс.

mega game

Probably one of the worst online games I've played. The whole point of the game is for you to run away from a killer and repair generators to escape. All the killers do in this game is kill you then stand over your body till you die and then you lose. Every game is exactly the same, I have not had a single game where there was not someone targeting you the entire time till your dead. I think I paid 40$ for this, its awful, would highly recommend you don't get it.

Edit: for the people saying that ive only played in 30 rounds, how the hell can you only play 30 rounds with around 10 hours of play time.... especially when the rounds last no more than 5 minutes for everyone to die to the killer. yes the game was 40$ when I got it.
